revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Kasda |model=KW5813 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/28/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=OWI-KW5813,OWI-KW5813H |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43217T |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=WLAN |default_ssid_regex=^WLAN$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=adslroot |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://kasda.cn/product_info.asp?k=&id=188 Product page]
"KW5813H_B281T", "REV:1.1", and "2011.04.12" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
It is presumed to be fully '''Broadcom''' based.
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :Presumed to use a 00:0E:F4 ('''Kasda''') OUI (on label in external photos. it's also in the manual)
